mapper.insert:
insert into teacher (teacherId, teacherName, picId, schoolId, gradeId, sex, education, telNumber, teachingLevel, regDate, notes,openId,signed,good_at) values
(#{item.teacherid}, #{item.teachername},#{item.picid}, #{item.schoolid}, #{item.gradeid}, #{item.sex},#{item.education},#{item.telnumber},#{item.teachinglevel}, #{item.regdate}, #{item.notes},#{item.openId},#{item.signed},#{item.goodAt})

insert into picture(picId, picUrl, picName, picType) values
(#{item.picid},#{item.picurl},#{item.picname},#{item.pictype})

insert into school(schoolId, schoolName, schoolAddress, termInfo) values
(#{item.schoolid}, #{item.schoolname}, #{item.schooladdress}, #{item.terminfo})

insert into user(userAccountId, userId, userName, password, userType, userPrivilege, loginStatus, openId, nickname,headimgurl) values
(#{item.useraccountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usertype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.userprivilege,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.loginstatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.headimgurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT b.teacherId,a.checkedLessonNum as withDrawLessonNum,a.withDrawLessonNum as checkedLessonNum,a.frozenLessonNum,b.teacherName,b.sex, b.telNumber,b.regDate,b.schoolId,b.openId,c.schoolName FROM teacher b LEFT JOIN lessontradesum a ON a.teacherId=b.teacherId LEFT JOIN school c ON b.schoolId=c.schoolId
a.checkedLessonNum > 0
AND b.teacherName LIKE '%${teacherName}%'
AND b.telNumber LIKE '%${telNumber}%'
SELECT a.teacherId,count(*) FROM order_teaching_r a LEFT JOIN ordersum b ON a.orderId = b.orderId AND b.lessonLeftNum > 0 GROUP BY teacherId
SELECT teacherId,COUNT(teachingId) AS teachingCount FROM order_teaching_r a LEFT JOIN ordersum b ON a.orderId=b.orderId WHERE b.lessonLeftNum > 0 GROUP BY teacherId
SELECT teacherId,sum(applyLessons) AS applyLessons FROM lessontrade WHERE DATE_FORMAT(applyTime,"%Y%m") = #{queryDate} GROUP BY teacherId
